remarks.para: May be inoperative provided visual confirmation of proper rudder movement is made before each departure.

placard.para: Placard on rudder trim indicator: "RUD TRIM IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Perform visual check of surface movement:
Establish communications – flight deck to ground.

warning.para: ENSURE THAT PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL FLIGHT CONTROL SURFACES.

entry.para: Rudder Pedal Full Left, then Full Right
Observe both upper and lower rudder deflection to left, then right.

numlitem.para: Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
